meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of aldehydes.
meanings.sent1: The aldehydic smell of fresh bread filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: Her perfume had a faint aldehydic scent.
meanings.sent3: The aldehydic aroma of the cleaning solution made her sneeze.
meanings.sent4: The aldehydic notes in the wine added a unique twist to its flavor.
meanings.sent5: The aldehydic nature of the chemical compound was evident in its reaction with other substances.

meanings.definition: Having the properties of an aldehyde.
meanings.sent1: The aldehydic nature of the compound made it suitable for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The aldehydic compound exhibited a strong odor when heated.
meanings.sent3: She joked that his aldehydic behavior made him stand out in a crowd.
meanings.sent4: The aldehydic characteristics of the solution were crucial for its effectiveness.
meanings.sent5: The aldehydic properties of the substance were evident in its ability to undergo oxidation reactions.
